
                            
                            <p>75寸的x mini&nbsp; &nbsp;12月开始出现花屏，联系售后上门，他们说电视中毒了，恢复出厂设置就走了。用电视自带软件放也会出现。 <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202501/12/190246gt57ztjc8pxziyxo.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202501/12/190246gt57ztjc8pxziyxo.jpg"> <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202501/12/190247hew08m8r8gh1p8p8.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202501/12/190247hew08m8r8gh1p8p8.jpg"> <br> 	    	     <br> </p><p class="pl">哈？</p>
